name: RecommendationsRelatedToMedicationRegimenChangeMedicationDosageForm
title: Recommendations Related to Medication Regimen, Change Medication Dosage Form
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent an instance where a provider recommends to a prescriber or provider in modify a medication dosage form within a prescribed regimen should be changed.),(Data Element Scope: Datatype: Intervention

The intent of this data element is to document a drug therapy recommendation to modify a medication dosage form within a prescribed treatment regimen.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that represent a recommendation to modify the dosage form of a medication or therapy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Any codes that represent an explicit action has taken place or other codes for recommendations that are not specifically for changing a medication dosage form.)

concept.display: Recommendation to change medication dose form (procedure)

contains.display: Recommendation to change medication dose form (procedure)
